struct asmjit::x86x64::FpReg
#include <x86defs.h>

X86/X64 80-bit Fp register.

Public Functions

FpReg()

Create a dummy Fp register.

FpReg(const FpReg & other)

Create a reference to other FPU register.

FpReg(uint32_t type, uint32_t index, uint32_t size)

Create a custom Fp register.

FpReg(const _NoInit &)

Create non-initialized Fp register.

FpReg clone()

Clone BaseReg operand.

FpReg & setSize(uint32_t size)

Set register size.

FpReg & setCode(uint32_t code)

Set register code.

FpReg & setCode(uint32_t type, uint32_t index)

Set register type and index.

FpReg & setType(uint32_t type)

Set register type.

FpReg & setIndex(uint32_t index)

Set register index.
